	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#672)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#622)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#672)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#678)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#625)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#672)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#626)
